triples.name: Self-supervised learning
triples.relevance: CURL uses contrastive self-supervised learning to extract features from raw pixels without labels.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: CURL combines reinforcement learning with representation learning to learn from pixel observations.

triples.name: Feature learning
triples.relevance: CURL proposes an improved method for learning high-level features from raw pixels using contrastive objectives.

triples.name: Unsupervised learning
triples.relevance: CURL extracts representations using contrastive unsupervised learning without requiring labeled data.

triples.name: Model-free
triples.relevance: CURL performs off-policy model-free control on top of the learned feature representations.

triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: CURL is a deep RL approach that learns from raw pixel observations for control tasks.

triples.name: Atari 2600
triples.relevance: CURL is evaluated on Atari games as a benchmark for pixel-based reinforcement learning.
